title: Social Media Ethics: Scenario-Based Online Training for Practitioner Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Structured around social media ethics dilemma cases that language education practitioners may encounter in real-world settings

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more ethical issues that may arise when using social media.
Learners can apply an ethical decision-making framework in scenario-based discussions to propose actionable solutions.
Learners can design and present strategies for maintaining professionalism in digital environments at individual and organizational levels.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
